EDIT: I'm still having problems with the cov1d. After recompiling the forward passes works fine but when I call backwards on conv1d i get a segmentation fault. I used the compilation settings below and followed https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch#from-source

# build pytorch assuming cudnn 6 is extracted to ~/cuda
git clone https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git
cd pytorch
export  WITH_CUDNN=1 
export CUDNN_LIB_DIR=/home/USERNAME/cuda/lib64
export CUDNN_INCLUDE_DIR=/home/USERNAME/cuda/include
pip install -r requirements.txt
python setup.py install

Maybe documentation of the CUDNN_LIB_DIR and CUDNN_INCLUDE_DIR should be added to the readme/docs?

Thanks for looking into this :)

```

export CUDNN_LIB_DIR=/home/USERNAME/cuda/lib64
export CUDNN_INCLUDE_DIR=/home/USERNAME/cuda/include
